Jamison's Super Awesome Two Page Website

After working awhile and not being able to get Astro to work properly, I decided that I would try out 11ty for this Challenge. I also added in MVP.css because I really like it's design layout and ease of use!

"11ty worked much better for me to get set up with no errors and from there everything else was easy!" - Jamison
